title: OpenS2S: Advancing Fully Open-Source End-to-End Empathetic Large Speech Language Model
author: Chen Wang (Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences), Tianyu Peng (Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences), Wen Yang (Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences), Yinan Bai (Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences), Guangfu Wang (GWM AI Lab), Jun Lin (GWM AI Lab), Lanpeng Jia (GWM AI Lab), Lingxiang Wu (Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences), ..., Jiajun Zhang (Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences)
relevance_why: This work aligns closely with the research focus on empathetic interaction and audio processing, showcasing how neural architectures can advance speech technology that captures emotional nuances, which is fundamentally relevant to Haohe Liu's exploration of audio-language models.
background: This paper presents an open-source model for empathetic speech interactions that can understand and respond to users' emotional cues using speech and language.
contribution: OpenS2S introduces a fully open-source empathetic large speech language model to solve the challenge of human-like emotional responses in AI interactions, achieving competitive performance with less training data and lower costs.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Previous models required extensive pre-training on massive datasets, making them difficult to reproduce and apply.
technical_comparison.novelty: OpenS2S achieves empathetic interaction capabilities without the need for large datasets, utilizing a novel automated data construction pipeline.

key_innovation: The integration of a streaming interleaved decoding system allows real-time empathetic speech generation without extensive training resources.
real_world_impact: This open-source endeavor can significantly improve the development of AI systems that interact more naturally and empathetically with users, which can enhance user experience in various applications like customer support and therapy.
limitations: No explicit limitations were mentioned by the authors.

new_terms.interleaved decoding: **Interleaved decoding** refers to a method in which tokens are generated from different representations simultaneously, optimizing the efficiency and responsiveness of the model.

open_sourcing: Model available at https://huggingface.co/CASIA-LM/OpenS2S and code at https://github.com/CASIA-LM/OpenS2S
